casebody.data:
PITTMAN
v.
PITTMAN, et al. 210P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019

James E. Pittman, Jr., For Pittman, James E. (Jr.).

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of June 2019 by Defendant (James E. Pittman, Jr.) for Notice of Appeal:

*86"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
